description.narrative: The Facility is mobilising funds for the most innovative and ambitious NAMA Support Projects, which are considered an integral part of meaningful mitigation actions and hence the international efforts to diminish the average rise in global temperature.

policy-marker.narrative: Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention on Biological Diversity
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

title.narrative: Public and private upscaling in China’s waste management sector by replicable flagship cases of integrated waste management systems and waste-to-energy technologies, that have been proven financially sustainable in at least three municipalities.
M1: GHG emissions reduced [metric tons of CO2]. Accumulated emission savings within the NSP period are between 433.100 and 736.270 tCO2eq (tCO2e)

Colombian manufacturers have converted their production and offer climate friendly and efficient fridges on the national market. The programme will promote the distribution of green fridges in the country while old, returned fridge are recycled.

M1: GHG emissions reduced [metric tons of CO2]. Two components will lead to emission reductions: New refrigerators placed on the market and the recycling of old returned refrigerators. Accumulated emission savings within the NSP period are 2,2000,000 tCO2eq (tCO2e)
